rules.description: Redo: Ctrl + Y => Cmd + Shift + Z
Select All: Ctrl + A => Cmd + A
Find/Find Next|Go To: Ctrl + F/G => Cmd + F/G
Exit Application|Quit: Alt + F4 => Cmd + Q
New Tab: Ctrl + T => Cmd + T
Jump to Address Bar: Ctrl + L => Cmd + L
Reload: F5 | Ctrl + R => Cmd + R
Cursor Navigation: Home, End, Arrow Jumps, etc
Lock Computer: Cmd+L => Ctrl + Cmd + Q
Lock Computer (Alternate): Alt+L => Ctrl + Cmd + Q
